scripts.docker-config: cat dockerToken | docker --config ~/.anomalizer-config login ghcr.io -u "$(cat dockerUsername)" --password-stdin
scripts.docker-build: npm run docker-tag && expo build:web && docker build --tag anomalizer-ui .
scripts.docker-build-amd64: expo build:web && docker buildx build --push --platform linux/amd64 --tag $(cat dockerTarget) .
scripts.docker: npm run docker-pull && docker run -p 3001:3001/tcp --user default -e ENDPOINT=localhost:8056 -e USE_ARTIFICIAL_LATENCY=true --name anomalizer-ui $(cat dockerTarget)
scripts.docker-local: npm run docker-remove && npm run docker-build && docker run -p 3001:3001/tcp --user default -e ENDPOINT=localhost:8056 -e USE_ARTIFICIAL_LATENCY=true --name anomalizer-ui  anomalizer-ui
scripts.docker-push: npm run docker-config && npm run docker-build && npm run docker-tag && docker push $(cat dockerTarget)
scripts.docker-pull: npm run docker-config && npm run docker-remove && docker --config ~/.anomalizer-config pull $(cat dockerTarget)
